column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We got the chicken empanadas- one empanada. All mushrooms
column2: which I am allergic to. Warm goat cheese- meh
column3: had better. Short ribs- one rib
column4: probably the greasiest piece of meat that had been sitting around in it's own greasiness I've had in a while. I still shudder to think. The manchengo mashies were good. BF had some shrimp
column5: said they were boiled and gross.
